title: Eyes on Me
description: King Forthis Mianne is dead. His daughter, Rioghan, is poised to take his place. With parliament threatening to oust her and the nation of Baron crumbling beneath her, she turns to her most trusted aides to try and stem the tide and reclaim her grip on the crown she is owed. Neither the Politician with her in his sights, nor the bodyguard she finds herself growing closer to each day, can tear her hands from the throne of Baron's Bell.The flames of change are rising fast around her - and a single offer may change the course of history.
author: Jon D. Arthur
